title: Online Survey on Game User Experience

embed.description: Qualtrics makes sophisticated research simple and empowers users to capture customer, product, brand & employee experience insights in one place.

body:
Hey Gamers! We are Information Systems researchers at UNSW and we are looking for active gamers who will be interested in taking part in an online survey asking for your experiences as a League of Legends player (or other team-based online games). The survey should take approximately 15 – 20 mins.

By completing the survey, you will have the chance to win **one of ten double movie tickets! **The draw will be performed on December 16th 2018 and winners will be notified via email with movie ticket attached.

This research study aims to understand the user experience (UX) of online gamers and how communication in teams impacts UX. Studying these will assist in advising future online games development initiatives for designers and companies, as well as further improving the understanding of Online Games in general from an academic perspective.

Taking part in this research is always optional and we will not be keeping any personal data. Your decision to not participate or to withdraw will not affect your relationship with UNSW Sydney. We are looking for people who want to take part in this research and who:

• Currently playing League of Legends (or any other team-based online games e.g. Overwatch, CS:GO)
• Are 18 years or over
• Are fluent in English

If you match the above criteria and are interested in becoming involved in our study of online gaming, please click this link to the survey:

https://unsw.au1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_eaeKPtflB2jf6i9

If you have any questions, please contact the researchers using the details below:

Miss Kathy Xu | School of Information Systems, and Technology Management | UNSW Business School UNSW Australia | M: +61 435 603 823 | E: kathy.xu@unsw.edu.au

Dr Lesley Land | School of Information Systems, and Technology Management | UNSW Business School UNSW Australia | M: +61 2 9385 4738 | E: l.land@unsw.edu.au

Assoc. Prof Zixiu Guo | School of Information Systems, and Technology Management | UNSW Business School UNSW Australia | M: +61 2 9385 7174 | E: z.guo@unsw.edu.au

replies.body: Make all future team games have a solo performance based ranking system or they will have a major negative behavioral repercussions heavily affecting the legitimacy of the ranked system and any esports that go along with it.
